item.title: 6 Feared Dead After Medical Plane Crashes Near Philadelphia Mall
item.description: The Learjet, carrying a pediatric patient and five others, crashed in Northeast Philadelphia. It was flying to Mexico with a stop planned in Missouri.

item.title: Moo Deng, the Toddler Hippopotamus, Still Has Star Power
item.description: The pygmy hippopotamus, now 6 months old, is Thailandâ€™s biggest celebrity, and the crowds keep flocking. What explains her charm?
